item.title: Adobe shares drop 13% as concerns about AI growth overshadow better-than-expected results
item.description: Adobe shares fell on Thursday as investors fretted over lingering growth concerns and the company's artificial intelligence monetization strategy.

item.title: Dollar General store review and closures dent fourth-quarter earnings
item.description: As part of the reevaluation, the dollar-store chain said it will close 96 Dollar General stores and 45 Popshelf stores and will convert six other loca...

item.title: American Eagle says consumer is slowing down, issues weak guidance
item.description: American Eagle warned that consumers are slowing down as recession fears swirl.

item.title: Rheinmetall sales surge 36% in 2024, as company forecasts 'major' military order boom
item.description: Last year's sales boom helped push Rheinmetall's operating profit to a record high.

item.title: Porsche CEO says Volkswagen ties 'should play a role' amid U.S. tariff threat
item.description: Porsche is part of Volkswagen Group, which has an assembly plant and other facilities in the U.S.
